ruling: - After [[Whirlwind Weasel]]'s Flip Effect has resolved, the effects of already face-up Spell and Trap Cards, like [[Ultimate Offering]], can still be activated. The effects of Spell and Trap Cards that activate when the card is destroyed, such as [[Blast with Chain]] or [[Ojamagic]] will also still be activated. (In other words, you cannot activate a card, but you can activate an effect.)
